Events that occurred on 12 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1925 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to a Mr. Ashton.
1932 - Actor Michael Elsworth is born.
1967 - Donald Swann and William Elvin record the music for The Road Goes Ever On.
2002 - The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring is published.
2007 - The fan film The Peril to the Shire premières to a private audience.
2007 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shores of Evendim patch is released.
2015 - Parma Eldalamberon 22 is published.

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull (eds), The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion, p. xlx
